extendedInfo.description: SingTel Pit Stop App is the ultimate on to go guide for racing, events and places to eat in Singapore. Download the FREE SingTel Pit Stop app to: -          Receive the latest race news-          Get up-to-date event highlights -          Search for the best places to eat near you-          Take part in the Trivia quiz (One or two player modes) -          Upload photos of your special moments to the Pit Stop Fan Gallery and share them with your friends

reviews.title: The best app around for the 2012 F1 weekend!
reviews.comment: An awesome guide to the upcoming events happening next, around the circuit park. I also get to share my beautiful  pictures taken at trackside and predict race results for a chance to win the latest Galaxy S3 smartphone! The best for the weekend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Looking forward to the results for the prediction contest!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: F1 is alive!!!
reviews.comment: A bit buggy on my galaxy note, but overall an awesome app to accompany the F1 atmosphere. Will give it an additional star if the app comes with the roaring sound of an F1 engine   :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: its singtel and its amazing!
reviews.comment: beautiful ui and a really useful and essential guide for the race!  win a galaxy s3 when u play!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does the trivia actually work?
reviews.comment: this works great. can\'t wait till the race day to see if the trivia actually wins prizes, or it\'s just a mere \"time-killer\" in the app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pitstop
reviews.comment: A quicker way to keep track of the race. Much Less complicated than all the other f1 apps out there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for F1 fans!
reviews.comment: Nice way to keep track of how the season is going and passing some time with the games
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks fun
reviews.comment: Look forward to giving it a try this weekend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app! We can\'t wait for F1!
reviews.comment: Works so much better than the other Singapore F1 apps out there. The trivia is a nice touch and will come in gandy, in between races..
reviews.author: A Google User
